meta.title: CFP Land
meta.description: Calls for Proposals, Tech Conferences, and Speaking Tips
meta.author: Karl L. Hughes

data.name: AsyncAPI Online Conference
data.description: It all started like a crazy idea. Since we’re all confined at home due to the coronavirus pandemic, why not organizing a fully-remote online conference to meet each other and have some fun? We asked the community and the response was overwhelmingly positive. We had no choice! Time for some action!

data.name: General
data.description: Conferences covering a wide range of web development and software engineering topics.

relatedRecords.name: NE RPC
relatedRecords.description: NE RPC is a community-organised, free-to-attend virtual conference, showcasing speakers from the North East of England. We’ll be hosting a day of 30-minute talks, covering a wide variety of tech subjects. Whether bleeding-edge or tried-and-tested, we’re listening!

relatedRecords.name: Linaro Virtual Connect 2020
relatedRecords.description: Every six months, over 300 of the world’s leading open source engineers working on Arm get together for a full week of engineering sessions and hacking at Linaro Connect.
